sentences.english: This is a very good Huffman tree C code can run.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很不错的赫夫曼树C代码，可以运行。

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代码行的结尾用硬编码空格或制表符。

sentences.english: You can modify the code presented here to support only key-press events.
sentences.chinese: 您可以修改本文所示的代码以仅支持按键事件。
设计了G代码编译运行环境。

sentences.english: According to the Chinese character semeiology, code-switching function is the basic information function of character system.
sentences.chinese: 代码转换功能是文字系统最基本的信息功能之一。

sentences.english: Paste this code into your test class and save it.
sentences.chinese: 将此代码粘帖到您的测试类，并保存。

sentences.english: An exception specifier can omit the parameter name when a catch needs to know only the type of the exception in order to handle it.
sentences.chinese: 说明符的类型决定了处理代码能够捕获的异常种类。

sentences.english: This sequence of function calls shows you the path to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 这个函数调用序列显示了造成崩溃的代码路径。

sentences.english: Right-click on the managed system you want to enter the validation code for.
sentences.chinese: 右键单击您想要为其输入验证代码的所管理系统。

sentences.english: Do not bludgeon a problem to death with code.
sentences.chinese: 不要棒击一个问题来伴随代码死亡。

sentences.english: Looking back, it was collective code ownership at its finest!
sentences.chinese: 现在回想起来，集体性的代码所有权非常有用。

sentences.english: The test data is also included with the article's source code.
sentences.chinese: 测试数据也随附在文章的源代码中。

sentences.english: To manage the numbers of organizing institutions and the bar code of the products within the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 管理全市组织机构代码和商品条码工作。

sentences.english: Trust newlines and indents to keep my code not only structured but running?
sentences.chinese: 让我相信换行和缩进能保证代码的结构和运行？

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代码将遵循开放源码许可证发布。
